description: Spherical Harmonics Decomposition of a surface's coordinates or data

i_type_s.title: Input type S
i_type_s.description: Unit sphere, isotopic to the surface domain over which the data to be decomposed is defined.

i_type_sd.title: Input type SD
i_type_sd.description: A surface whose node coordinates provide data vectors (X, Y, Z) to be decomposed or a dataset whose columns are to be individually decomposed. You can specify multiple surfaces to be processed.

bases_prefix.title: Bases prefix
bases_prefix.description: Save the basis functions under the prefix BASES_PREFIX.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Write out the reconstructed data into dataset PREFIX and write the beta coefficients for each processed data column.

o_type_sdr.title: Output type SDR
o_type_sdr.description: Write out a new surface with reconstructed coordinates.

sigma.title: Smoothing sigma
sigma.description: Smoothing parameter (0 .. 0.001) which weighs down the contribution of higher order harmonics.
